title: The Killer Shrews ( 1959) SCI FI HORROR

sources.title: The Killer Shrews ( 1959) SCI FI HORROR
sources.description: On an isolated island, a well-meaning scientist has been working on a serum to reduce world hunger by shrinking humans to half their size. Unfortunately, his experiments have the opposite effect spawning mutant giant shrews, which have escaped, growing larger and more hungry day-by-day!
